original: Despite its seemingly haphazard arrangement, the city's public transportation network is astonishingly efficient.
options: The city's public transportation is highly effective, even though it appears disorganized.
The disorganized nature of the city's public transit system has led to a decrease in its efficiency.
It is astonishing that the city managed to build such an efficient public transportation network in a haphazard way.
The city's public transportation network was intentionally designed to look chaotic but operate efficiently.
explanation: המילה 'haphazard' (אקראי/לא מאורגן) מוחלפת ב-'disorganized'. הביטוי 'astonishingly efficient' (יעיל להפליא) מוחלף ב-'highly effective'. התשובה הנכונה שומרת על מבנה הניגוד (Despite מומר ל-even though).

original: The sheer volume of empirical data supporting the theory renders it virtually indisputable.
options: The theory is difficult to prove due to the overwhelming amount of empirical data required.
Because there is such a massive amount of evidence backing it, the theory is almost impossible to contradict.
The sheer amount of data makes it virtually impossible to fully understand the theory.
Although there is empirical data supporting the theory, many still dispute its validity.
explanation: 'sheer volume' (כמות עצומה) מוחלף ב-'massive amount'. 'renders it virtually indisputable' (הופך אותה לבלתי ניתנת לערעור כמעט) מומר ל-'almost impossible to contradict'.

original: Many contemporary architects eschew traditional ornamental designs in favor of minimalist aesthetics.
options: Traditional ornamental designs are being preserved by contemporary architects who appreciate minimalism.
A large number of modern architects reject classic decorative elements, preferring a simple and unadorned style instead.
Minimalist aesthetics have been heavily influenced by the traditional ornamental designs used by modern architects.
Contemporary architects often combine minimalist aesthetics with traditional decorative designs.
explanation: הפועל 'eschew' (להימנע מ/לדחות) מוחלף ב-'reject'. 'ornamental' (קישוטי) מוחלף ב-'decorative'. 'minimalist aesthetics' מקביל ל-'simple and unadorned style'.

original: Unless the government implements stringent economic reforms, rampant inflation will continue to erode the citizens' purchasing power.
options: The citizens' purchasing power will inevitably decrease, regardless of the economic reforms implemented by the government.
Rampant inflation has forced the government to introduce strict economic reforms to protect citizens' purchasing power.
If the government fails to apply strict economic changes, severe inflation will keep diminishing what the public can afford to buy.
By implementing stringent economic reforms, the government has successfully stopped inflation from eroding purchasing power.
explanation: המבנה התנאי 'Unless... will continue' מומר ל-'If... fails to... will keep'. 'stringent' (נוקשה) הופך ל-'strict'. 'erode' (לשחוק) מתורגם רעיונית ל-'diminishing what the public can afford to buy'.

original: The author's latest novel is a compelling, albeit somewhat convoluted, exploration of human morality.
options: The author's newest book is a fascinating but rather complicated examination of human ethics.
In her latest novel, the author completely avoids discussing human morality due to its convoluted nature.
The exploration of human morality in the author's new novel is confusing and consequently uninteresting.
The author's latest novel is highly praised for its straightforward and compelling approach to human morality.
explanation: 'compelling' (מרתק) מומר ל-'fascinating'. 'albeit' (אם כי/למרות ש) מוחלף ב-'but'. 'convoluted' (מפותל/מסובך) מוחלף ב-'complicated'.

original: Prolonged exposure to the sun's ultraviolet rays is detrimental to the skin and can accelerate the aging process.
options: The aging process can be slowed down by avoiding exposure to the sun's ultraviolet rays.
Skin damage and rapid aging are inevitable consequences of spending time in the sun.
Spending excessive amounts of time in the sun harms the skin and may cause it to age more quickly.
The sun's ultraviolet rays are the primary cause of skin disease and premature aging.
explanation: 'Prolonged exposure' (חשיפה ממושכת) הופך ל-'Spending excessive amounts of time'. 'detrimental' (מזיק) שקול ל-'harms'. 'accelerate' (להאיץ) מומר ל-'cause it to age more quickly'.

original: The CEO was ousted by the board of directors following a series of highly publicized financial blunders.
options: The board of directors resigned after the CEO made several very public financial mistakes.
Following several major financial successes, the CEO was highly praised by the board of directors.
The CEO decided to step down due to the excessive publicity surrounding the company's financial issues.
The board of directors dismissed the CEO after he committed a number of well-known financial errors.
explanation: הפועל 'ousted' (הודח/סולק - מופיע הרבה בפסיכומטרי) מוחלף ב-'dismissed'. 'blunders' (טעויות קריטיות) מומר ל-'errors'. 'highly publicized' הופך ל-'well-known'. שים לב שמסיח 1 הופך את היוצרות (הבורד התפטר במקום המנכ"ל).

original: Contrary to popular belief, bats are not blind; in fact, many species possess excellent night vision.
options: It is a common misconception that bats cannot see, when actually many of them see very well in the dark.
Because bats have excellent night vision, people mistakenly believe that they are blind.
Popular belief suggests that bats are blind, which is true for most species despite their excellent night vision.
While some bats are blind, the vast majority possess excellent night vision, contrary to what many believe.
explanation: 'Contrary to popular belief' (בניגוד לאמונה הרווחת) הופך ל-'It is a common misconception' (תפיסה שגויה נפוצה). 'not blind' מומר ל-'cannot see'. 'night vision' מוסבר כ-'see very well in the dark'.

original: The treaty was initially hailed as a diplomatic triumph, yet it ultimately failed to yield lasting peace.
options: The treaty was considered a massive failure from the beginning because it did not result in peace.
Although it was originally celebrated as a great political success, the agreement did not produce enduring peace in the end.
The diplomatic triumph was short-lived because the treaty was completely ignored by both sides.
Ultimately, the treaty succeeded in bringing about lasting peace, despite initial doubts about its diplomatic value.
explanation: 'initially hailed' (הוערך/שובח בתחילה) מומר ל-'originally celebrated'. 'diplomatic triumph' (ניצחון דיפלומטי) = 'great political success'. 'lasting peace' (שלום בר-קיימא) = 'enduring peace'.

original: Many educators contend that rote memorization is an obsolete pedagogical method that stifles creativity.
options: Memorization is still considered by many educators to be the most effective way to foster creativity in students.
A large number of teachers argue that learning by repetition is an outdated teaching technique which suppresses originality.
Educators believe that creative teaching methods are making rote memorization obsolete.
Despite its obsolescence, rote memorization is frequently used by teachers who want to encourage creativity.
explanation: 'contend' (טוענים) = 'argue'. 'rote memorization' (שינון בעל פה) = 'learning by repetition'. 'obsolete pedagogical method' (שיטת הוראה מיושנת) = 'outdated teaching technique'. 'stifles' (חונק/מדכא) = 'suppresses'.

original: The new policy was implemented to mitigate the adverse repercussions of the economic downturn.
options: The economic downturn was caused by the adverse effects of the new policy.
To lessen the negative consequences of the economic decline, the new policy was put into effect.
The new policy completely eliminated the economic problems it was designed to solve.
Despite the new policy, the economic downturn continued to have severe repercussions.
explanation: הפועל 'mitigate' (להפחית/למתן) שקול ל-'lessen'. 'adverse repercussions' (השלכות שליליות) מומר ל-'negative consequences'. ו-'economic downturn' (האטה כלכלית) מוחלף ב-'economic decline'.

original: The ubiquity of smartphones has rendered standalone digital cameras virtually obsolete.
options: Smartphones have become so widespread that standalone digital cameras are now almost entirely outdated.
Despite the popularity of smartphones, digital cameras remain ubiquitous in modern society.
Standalone digital cameras are becoming obsolete because they cannot connect to smartphones.
The high cost of smartphones has led many people to rely on standalone digital cameras instead.
explanation: המילה 'ubiquity' (נוכחות בכל מקום) מומרת ל-'widespread' (נפוץ). 'rendered' (הפך ל) מוחלף ב-'have become'. המילה החשובה 'obsolete' (מיושן/שעבר זמנו) שקולה ל-'outdated'.

original: The scientist was reluctant to concede that her groundbreaking theory contained a fundamental flaw.
options: The scientist eagerly admitted that there was a major mistake in her new theory.
It was difficult to find the fundamental flaw in the scientist's groundbreaking theory.
The scientist hesitated to admit that there was a basic error in her innovative theory.
Because her theory was groundbreaking, the scientist refused to believe it had any flaws.
explanation: 'reluctant' (מסתייג/לא שש) הופך ל-'hesitated' (היססה). הפועל 'concede' (להודות ב-) מומר ל-'admit'. 'fundamental flaw' (פגם בסיסי) שקול ל-'basic error'.

original: The prime minister's inflammatory remarks only served to exacerbate the already volatile situation.
options: The volatile situation caused the prime minister to make inflammatory remarks.
The prime minister's calming words helped to stabilize the highly explosive situation.
The already unstable situation was made even worse by the prime minister's provocative comments.
Although the situation was volatile, the prime minister's remarks had little effect on it.
explanation: המילה 'exacerbate' (להחמיר) מתורגמת כ-'made even worse'. 'inflammatory remarks' (הערות מתסיסות) מוחלף ב-'provocative comments'. 'volatile' (נפיץ/הפכפך) מומר ל-'unstable'.

original: The sheer cost of the initial investment deterred many entrepreneurs from pursuing the otherwise lucrative endeavor.
options: Many entrepreneurs avoided the highly profitable venture simply because of the massive upfront expense.
The endeavor was so lucrative that entrepreneurs were willing to overlook the high initial investment.
Because the initial investment was so low, many entrepreneurs were attracted to the lucrative endeavor.
Despite the massive upfront expense, a large number of entrepreneurs pursued the venture.
explanation: הפועל 'deterred' (הרתיע) מומר ל-'avoided'. 'lucrative' (רווחי/משתלם) שקול ל-'highly profitable'. 'initial investment' (השקעה ראשונית) מוחלף ב-'upfront expense'.

original: The ambiguous wording of the contract left it open to multiple interpretations, preventing a clear consensus.
options: A clear consensus was reached because the contract was written in such an ambiguous manner.
The contract was easy to understand, which led to multiple interpretations and a clear consensus.
Because the contract was phrased vaguely, it could be understood in various ways, making it impossible to reach an agreement.
The multiple interpretations of the contract helped the parties quickly reach a consensus.
explanation: 'ambiguous' (דו-משמעי/מעורפל) מומר ל-'phrased vaguely'. 'multiple interpretations' מתואר כ-'understood in various ways'. 'consensus' (הסכמה/קונצנזוס) מומר ל-'reach an agreement'.

original: The value of the artwork derives solely from its historical significance rather than its intrinsic aesthetic appeal.
options: The artwork is considered valuable primarily because of its beauty, not its history.
The historical importance of the artwork, combined with its beauty, makes it incredibly valuable.
The piece of art is prized exclusively for its historical importance, not for its natural beauty.
Despite its lack of historical significance, the artwork's intrinsic beauty makes it very valuable.
explanation: המילה 'solely' (אך ורק) שקולה ל-'exclusively'. 'intrinsic' (טבוע/פנימי) מומר ל-'natural', ו-'aesthetic appeal' מוחלף בפשטות ב-'beauty'.

original: Progress on the construction project was significantly hindered by cumbersome bureaucratic regulations.
options: The construction project advanced rapidly due to the efficient bureaucratic regulations.
Awkward and complex administrative rules greatly slowed down the advancement of the building project.
The construction workers found a way to bypass the cumbersome regulations and speed up the project.
Bureaucratic regulations were implemented to hinder the progress of the dangerous construction project.
explanation: הפועל 'hindered' (עוכב/הופרע) מומר ל-'slowed down'. המילה 'cumbersome' (מסורבל) מוחלפת ב-'Awkward and complex'. 'regulations' (תקנות) מומר ל-'rules'.

original: Close scrutiny of the financial documents revealed several alarming discrepancies.
options: A careful examination of the financial records uncovered a number of worrying inconsistencies.
The alarming discrepancies in the financial documents were hidden from public scrutiny.
Despite close inspection, no errors were found in the financial documents.
The financial documents were deliberately altered to conceal several alarming discrepancies.
explanation: 'scrutiny' (בדיקה קפדנית) הופכת ל-'careful examination'. 'revealed' (חשף) שקול ל-'uncovered'. 'alarming' (מדאיג) הופך ל-'worrying', והמילה הפסיכומטרית 'discrepancies' (סתירות/אי-התאמות) שקולה ל-'inconsistencies'.

original: Realizing that further negotiation would be futile, the diplomats were compelled to abandon their peace efforts.
options: The diplomats continued their peace efforts even though they knew the negotiations were futile.
Because they understood that continuing to talk would be pointless, the diplomats were forced to give up their attempts to make peace.
The peace efforts were abandoned because the diplomats refused to participate in futile negotiations.
By compelling the diplomats to abandon their efforts, the negotiations became completely futile.
explanation: המילה 'futile' (חסר תוחלת/עקר) מוחלפת ב-'pointless'. הפועל 'compelled' (אולצו) שקול ל-'forced'. 'abandon' (לנטוש/לוותר) הופך ל-'give up'.

original: The researcher failed to provide sufficient empirical evidence to substantiate her controversial claims.
options: The controversial claims made by the researcher were proven true by a massive amount of empirical data.
The researcher could not back up her debatable assertions with enough observational data.
Sufficient empirical evidence is rarely provided to substantiate controversial claims in research.
Despite the lack of empirical evidence, the researcher's claims were widely accepted.
explanation: הפועל 'substantiate' (לאשש/לבסס) שקול ל-'back up'. 'claims' מומר ל-'assertions'. 'empirical' (אמפירי/מבוסס תצפיות) הופך ל-'observational'.

original: The invention of the printing press had a profound and inevitable impact on the spread of literacy.
options: The printing press was invented primarily to stop the inevitable decline of literacy.
It was unavoidable that the creation of the printing press would deeply affect the expansion of the ability to read and write.
The spread of literacy had a profound impact on the eventual invention of the printing press.
Despite its profound impact, the printing press did not inevitably lead to widespread literacy.
explanation: המילה 'profound' (עמוק/רב-משמעות) הופכת ל-'deeply affect'. המילה 'inevitable' (בלתי נמנע) מומרת ל-'unavoidable'. 'literacy' (אוריינות/ידיעת קרוא וכתוב) מתורגמת ל-'ability to read and write'.

original: His relentless pursuit of wealth came at the detriment of his physical health and personal relationships.
options: His physical health and personal relationships improved as a result of his relentless pursuit of wealth.
He pursued wealth relentlessly in order to improve his physical health and personal relationships.
His unending chase after money caused harm to both his physical well-being and his connections with others.
Despite the detriment to his health, his personal relationships benefited from his pursuit of wealth.
explanation: 'relentless pursuit' (מרדף חסר פשרות) שקול ל-'unending chase'. 'detriment' (נזק/פגיעה) הופך ל-'caused harm'. 'relationships' (מערכות יחסים) מומר ל-'connections with others'.

original: The smartphone has become an indispensable tool in modern life due to its incredible versatility.
options: Because it can perform so many different functions, the smartphone is now an essential device in today's world.
The incredible versatility of the smartphone makes it an interesting but ultimately unnecessary tool.
Modern life has become indispensable because of the versatile tools provided by the smartphone.
Only a few people find the smartphone to be an indispensable tool, despite its versatility.
explanation: המילה הקריטית 'indispensable' (שלא ניתן לוותר עליו) הופכת ל-'essential'. 'versatility' (רב-גוניות/ורסטיליות) מתורגמת ל-'can perform so many different functions'.

original: The significance of his early achievements was somewhat diminished when overshadowed by his later, more famous discoveries.
options: His early achievements were so significant that they overshadowed all of his later discoveries.
His later discoveries became famous because they diminished the significance of his early work.
The importance of his first accomplishments was somewhat reduced because his subsequent findings received so much more attention.
Despite his later famous discoveries, his early achievements never lost their significance.
explanation: המילה 'diminished' (פחת/הוקטן) שקולה ל-'reduced'. הפועל 'overshadowed' (הוטל צל עליהם/הועמו) מוסבר כ-'received so much more attention'. 'achievements' הופך ל-'accomplishments'.
